name: Armenian-Style Chicken And Bulgur Wheat
keywords: bulgur wheat, chicken, walnut, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons butter or vegetable oil (or more, to taste)
6 leg-thigh pieces of chicken, skinned and cut apart

recipeInstructions.text: Saute onion in butter in a pot until onion is wilted. Add stock, chicken pieces and salt; boil, cover and simmer over very low heat for 20 to 25 minutes.

Add bulgur wheat, walnut pieces, basil and pepper; stir to mix well, cover and simmer 15 to 20 minutes, or until liquid is absorbed. Turn off heat and allow to stand 10 minutes, covered and undisturbed, in a warm place. Fluff bulgur before serving.
